Description.Text: The Mave Hotel New York City puts travellers in the heart of iconic New York city with an urban retreat and simple, modern style. This boutique hotel with its refreshing and relaxed atmosphere is an ideal destination for business and leisure guests. Visitors can stop by at Rockefeller Center, which is home to Radio City Music Hall, the largest and magnificent theatre in the world. They can pay a visit to Madison Square Garden, well known arena for sports and concerts. Washington Arch is a crowded place in the city, where guests can enjoy visiting.

• Madison Square Park - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi • Flatiron Building - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • The Institute of Culinary Education - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • Empire State Building - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Macy's - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Madison Square Garden - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Times Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Broadway - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi • Central Park - 4.8 km / 3 mi • Ellis Island - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi • Statue of Liberty - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi

The MAve nyc offers 72 guestrooms in a 12-story property. Beds have pillowtop mattresses. Linens include down comforters and premium bedding. Guestrooms feature high-definition televisions with premium TV channel(s), free movie channels, HBO and ESPN. Business-friendly rooms are equipped with desks, direct-dial phones, free local calls, complimentary wireless Internet access, and complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access. Bathrooms include bathrobes, designer toiletries, and bathroom phones. Guestrooms provide clock radios. Additional amenities include iPod docking stations, speakerphones, and complimentary newspapers. Some guestrooms have city views. Services include a turndown service, housekeeping, and in-room massage. Amenities available on request include hypo-allergenic bedding. Rollaway beds are also available. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

The Mave Hotel New York City offers outstanding service and helpful concierge that enables guests to experience both style and substance at one stop. They can walk out on sightseeing tours to the city attractions such as Empire State Building, Grand Central Station and United Nations.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply. • Boat launch • Motor boating • Rowing or canoeing • Sailing • Aerobics • Volleyball • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Racquetball/squash • Running track/path • Basketball • Bicycle rentals • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing • Golf - driving range • Ice skating • Playground • Tennis
• Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon
The Flatiron District's Olana restaurant serves delicious local specialities and wine sources available in the Hudson River Valley.
